mapper.update: UPDATE comment SET content = #{content}, date = sysdate() WHERE (boardNo = #{boardNo} and userIndex = #{userIndex})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM comment WHERE boardNo = #{boardNo} AND userIndex = #{userIndex} AND comment_group = #{comment_group} AND comment_seq = #{comment_seq}
mapper.select: select count(*) from comment where boardNo = #{boardNo}
